website_summaries.verdict: A decent controller option for a good price, but can be somewhat glitchy.
pros: Comfortable to hold and features a classic controller layout
Good battery life that allows for hours of game time
Connects wirelessly to the Wii U

customer_reviews.title: Can Not Be Used For Movie Streaming
customer_reviews.text: I use my Wii-U to mainly watch Netflix. (I bought this for my kids some time ago, but they have now replaced it with other consoles) My old one stopped working, so I decided to replace it with this controller. However, it cannot be used as a gamepad for movie streaming for Wii-U. I believe it can only be used for functions that are compatible with the Wii only.
customer_reviews.author: Bellique Customer Management

customer_reviews.title: I needed a lot of extra controllers for a Super Smash Bros party that I was having
customer_reviews.text: Pro controllers are so much easier to use than the large Wii U game pad. I needed a lot of extra controllers for a Super Smash Bros party that I was having, and Wii U pro controllers are getting harder and harder to find. These controllers do not feel cheaply made. They hold a decent charge and work well as extras when we play with large groups. They sync to the Wii U easily. Cannot ask for more out of a Wii U controller.
customer_reviews.author: L L

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: We've now had this remote for almost a year. Bought it in January 2017 and it still works just as good as when it first arrived. Great product for a great price. It works just as great as an original Wii U remote for half the price of what it costs. It was very easy to sync to the system. My boys were excited because now they're able to play multi-player games together.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for our family - the price is right on and I wasn't willing to pay for the actual Wii U Nintendo controllers. They work great - there is one that is slightly sticky when moving right, but I just give that one to my son so I can beat him in Super Smash Bros or MarioKart. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Manzanitagirl

customer_reviews.title: Works well with WiiU
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Worked well with WiiU. Paired up with WiiU so kids can play split screen on Minecraft. Product is not an original Ninetindo WiiU controller but it works just as well. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: onechild

customer_reviews.title: I don't game much, so didn't want to buy an expensive controller.
customer_reviews.text: I never got much use out of this. I don't game much, so managed to get a couple hours of actual use before I noticed that one of the joysticks wasn't connecting. Of course that was a several months after purchase. I took it apart and found that the base of the stick had cracked.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Awful analog sticks make games nearly unplayable
customer_reviews.text: The analog sticks are awful: massive dead zone and perceptible levels of inconsistent drift make precision aiming (like using the bow & arrow in Zeda: BOTW) impossible. I'm ordering the genuine Nintendo Wii U Pro controller instead.
customer_reviews.author: Keith F. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Gentoo's customer service is wonderful and tremendously responsive. We had a problem with one of the knobs of the first controller and had to replace it. They got back to us right away and arranged for a refund so I could order a new one. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Petrina Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: 2/3 are good.  Returning the malfunctioning one was easy.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 and one is not working right - the joy stick didn't function correctly from the start. The return process is good. because of their return policy and auce 2/3 do work, I don't mind trying out another one to see if we have better luck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: It's great when it works
customer_reviews.text: It's great when it works. Then.. suddenly it starts moving characters all on its own. Very frustrating. I contacted company to see if they had ideas. They said to try resyncing controller, making sure you don't touch controls while syncing. That works for awhile and then starts acting up again.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: These are garbage
customer_reviews.text: We bought these, charged them, and then tried to play Mario 3D on the Wii U. The characters all ran to the bottom corner after a little bit of playing, and we couldn’t get them to move. We tried going back to our other controllers, and it didn’t happen again. Again, we tried these, and same thing. These are defective controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty good for about a month then the joysticks broke. Even new out of the box it had a slight delay and not smooth compared to the Nintendo gamepad. I would not recommend this product even for the price. The company emailed about my opinion but then did not respond when I responded guess since the return period had expired.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: Joystick always made the direction on a game go in the direction up.
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable to use the only thing I dindnt let me about the controller was that when I connected it to my Wii U the joy stick I can move it easily but it would move the up direction by which I mean when I played a game for the first time whichever game I play the player always goes up that's the only direction the controller tak s me is up no other direction.
customer_reviews.author: Junior Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Broke within an hour of an adult using it. Left joystick
customer_reviews.author: Danny S. Aldana

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service, not so good controller.
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for the company but negative stars for the device. There was a ton of lag, the joysticks were buggy and lacked sensitivity. It could have just been a one off issue?
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J

customer_reviews.title: Apparently not built to last...
customer_reviews.text: Both the gyroscope & left analog stick went out at the same time, only a month after a bought this. Pretty upset, as it really screw up some of the gameplay for certain Wii U games, & of course it happens right after my return/replace option is lost.
customer_reviews.author: MrsL2016

customer_reviews.title: Good controller. Synced with NO problem
customer_reviews.text: Good controller. Synced with NO problem. It would be better if it came in the box with an instruction instead of wrapped in plastic bag. I couldn't wrap it as a gift. Other than that, it's work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Levittowner

customer_reviews.title: works great and the kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been bugging me for a pro controller for a while. This was a last minute Christmas gift, works great and the kids love it. The only thing I'd change is that I wish it would have come with a charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Happy Boys
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my boys to use with their Wii U. They figured out how to sink them with the Wii U and now they can play multi player games like Minecraft. Good controllers at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Rossalyn

customer_reviews.title: Cannot charge, incorrect chord was included.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly. With the incorrect chord, it cannot be charged. Waiting to return/exchange the product.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Cannady

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: After about 5 weeks one of the joysticks is loose, I was there when it happened, they were playing a game and the joystick just pop out of place, no drop no nothing just playing a game with it!!!! I need to know how to return it but the vendor gives me less than a month from the time of delivery to return it!!!! No happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Loly Brandes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and this controller is awesome definitely worth the money and works amazing with our wii u! Thank you for making this available! Definitely buying at least 3 more!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drifting Joystick
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this controller because the left joystick never let us move forward or back but it had a drifting motion when not even touching the joystick. Tried to resynch and reset but that didn't seem to help. We didn't have any trouble with the return process so that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: russell taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect controller, perfect price
customer_reviews.text: Great controller. So far, no issues. Works the way a controller should, totally comfortable. Absolutely would order this again
customer_reviews.author: MisterMischief

customer_reviews.title: I bought it to play Zelda because I HATE using the game pad on the Wii U
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! I bought it to play Zelda because I HATE using the game pad on the Wii U. It's super comfortable to use long term.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for about two months or so before finally giving out
customer_reviews.text: This controller was good for a little while but it only lasted for a month or so before the controls started to loosen up and eventually the sticks just stopped working properly. It was good for a while but I think my kid was a little rough with it. Still it should've lasted a little longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: No more taking turns on wiiu!
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Did not need to charge long afyernopening to start using it wirelessly. Comes with charger that hooks up to wiiu and not a wall charger
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Quality is reflected by price
customer_reviews.text: Not a great controller. Decent price, but that's the trade off. The joy sticks have a massive dead zone built in, which is inconvenient if you are playing a game that requires any sort of precise movement/camera controls. I never got to the joystick wondering issues, but I'm sure if I didn't return the product, it would have happened sooner rather than later. Spend the extra money and go for the OEM Nintendo controller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The analog stick on the left is unstable. It often sticks and makes game play frustrating. I wonder if it should be replaced. I think it is worth the extra money to buy an authentic Nintendo controller.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Controller
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled to receive this controller. It was exactly what he needed for a new wii U game and was impressed that I (not a wii U user) was able to find what he needed. Thank you Amazon and Gentoo for perfect recommendations and descriptions to make my shopping easier!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend you just go genuine with these
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with my computer over bluetooth. I have a genuine one which works perfectly - and I assumed that since they are compatible with the wii that this would be compatible with bluetooth on my laptop. It wasn't, which I can only assume is due to a shoddy implementation of the protocol on this device. I would recommend you just go genuine with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great, does not hold charge
customer_reviews.text: This controller is just ok. Not great, does not hold charge long
customer_reviews.author: Thomas O.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky anolog sticks.
customer_reviews.text: They didn't work well. Ended up buying real Wii u products. You would run and keep running. Essentially ruining game play. The new real Wii controllers work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as my Official Nintendo controller
customer_reviews.text: Orderer two of these. Just like the title says, the works just as well as my official Nintendo Wii U Pro controller. Although, I snapped the ends of one of the USB charging cables, but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Holds a charge for a good amount of time! Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mama to girls

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought the contoller thinking I could use it to play games with my niece and nephew. But, when I used for 1 hour the buttons started to break, and the after 1 month of usage it's pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: hisham Al Bulushi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly. Did not hold charge well, and battery would have to be removed occasionally to unfreeze.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Roach

customer_reviews.title: Great controller!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My 6yo son has been pestering for a procontroller since he heard about it from his cousin. I opened the box and it synced right to our WiiU. I didnt even have to charge it first! He likes it more than playing with the gamepad now.
customer_reviews.author: Farmboy07

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these so my kids could play multiplayer on the WiiU. We've been using them for a few weeks now and they still work great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmyMomofFive

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price and great customer service as ...
customer_reviews.text: The first controller I ordered had a faulty connection to the charging cord. I notified the seller and was promptly provided with a replacement, which worked very well. Great product for the price and great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Wells

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product with a great price. Now all my grandkids can play Wii U together
customer_reviews.author: Janis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this controller
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this controller! Nice finish and so far appears to be constructed well Will definitely buy another soon
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great controller, but don't expect it to come with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great controller, but don't expect it to come with any instructions. Works great on the Wii U. My son was very happy to finally play split screen two player Minecraft!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sticky controls
customer_reviews.text: Works, but left control stick ... sticks. LIke, 1 week after having it.
customer_reviews.author: HoratioHellpop

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Opened it on Christmas day and played a few games on it and it worked. A great price for a Wii U Pro Controller and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr B

customer_reviews.title: Must have for 2-player Minecraft
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed for 2-player Minecraft on the Wii U. It arrived quickly and it works great! My kids are very happy !!!
customer_reviews.author: The Green Bee

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Works great, good weight and feel in your hands while using it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle C.

customer_reviews.title: 8 year old purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his remote. He doesn't like the Wii remote and decided to purchase this with his birthday money.
customer_reviews.author: firebub

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for the game we had hoped
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for a particular game (PIKMIN 3), but it has some serious glitches when playing that game. It is not consistent with it's movements, which makes it difficult to play. For other games it has worked fine, but it didn't work with PIKMIN 3.
customer_reviews.author: GCR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter needed at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Autrey

customer_reviews.title: Let see everything was great the shipping was fast it came in one piece ...
customer_reviews.text: Let see everything was great the shipping was fast it came in one piece also I don't know if it the game or the controller but it a bit jittery when aiming with the controller like it not sensitive enough. Besides that it work well.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact it came with a battery pack
customer_reviews.text: Light wieght and durable! Love the fact it came with a battery pack. Great product for a great price!

customer_reviews.title: Quick-Sync and Long Lasting Battery
customer_reviews.text: Instantly connected and we were playin Mario Kart 8 right away; recommended product!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and good quality! So much better than a wii mote :)

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fast shipping. My son is pleased. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Completely happy with the performance of this
customer_reviews.text: Completely happy with the performance of this controller. Bought it as a backup and it didn't disappoint.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son to be able to play with his brother on the wiiu...so far so good.

customer_reviews.text: Use it for the WII U. Haven't had any issues with it. works great with the system

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised, and I haven't had any issues whatsoever. I would recommend this product as its much cheaper than the official nintendo version and works just as well.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine and great price, I will buy another

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was great. The controller is working and has been for ...
customer_reviews.text: It was as the ad promoted. Shipping was great. The controller is working and has been for the past week with out any problems.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Quality
customer_reviews.text: The joystick broke internally after two months. Just pay a bit more $$$ and get the official brand. I wish I would have.

customer_reviews.title: great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: You cant even tell the difference, great buy for the price, works perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Works great with our Wii U, charged fast and seems to hold a charge for quite a while. Arrived quickly.

customer_reviews.title: It's working great! And I'm glad I bought this one instead ...
customer_reviews.text: It's working great! And I'm glad I bought this one instead of spending more money on a "official" Wii U one that would've worked the EXACT same.

customer_reviews.title: Naisu controller
customer_reviews.text: The control works great, has a nice battery life, and very comfortable to use

customer_reviews.text: When using this product I noticed that the left bummer doesn't work.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a month, then the left stick stopped working after a month. After four months of limited use, both sticks not working. Essentially useless now.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, seems to keep a charge for several hours too. I like it.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for games that require a lot of inputs, like Super Smash Brothers Wii U and Injustice: Gods Among Us. The price for the quality is really good, too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this, gift for my grandsons. And they love it, too.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Produce came as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Produce came as described. I highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: William MacMain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son. He was worried since these were not the nintendo brand they would not be good. I showed him the reviews and he agreed to try them. Well I am glad we did because they are such a savings compared to the name brand and they work perfectly. They sync very easily and work with no delays or any issues at all. my son recommends them and says they look and feel just like the name brand too.
customer_reviews.author: mommysean

customer_reviews.title: Good value; works fine
customer_reviews.text: Good value; works fine, be sure to read instructions (available online if you have already thrown them away)... kids love this!

customer_reviews.author: Jamey Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking. That's about it
customer_reviews.text: While the controller feels great in your hands, and syncs quickly and easily. The input reading itself leaves a lot to be desired, Only picking up readings from the main 8 compass directions instead of the wide variety of inputs in between. I Would NOT recommend this product if you play plenty of games and are not a small child.
customer_reviews.author: Drew S.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: The controller works great! It takes some getting used to since I've played exclusively on the Wii U Gamepad. Once I adjusted to the size difference, the controller was amazing! This one is offered at a great price compared to Nintendo's brand. I paid a little less than 50% of the Nintendo controller and this one works just as well. I bought this so I could play multiplayer games on the rare occasion people come over. If you're wanting a second controller, this one is a great option!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Sweet accessories
customer_reviews.text: Was as described. And for the price, well worth it. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Eric VAnderhoff

product_meta.title: Wii U Pro Controller Gamepad | Black | Wireless + Rechargeable Bluetooth | Dual Analog Joystick by SIBIONO.
feature_bullets: 1.Features smooth and precise dual analog joysticks to allow for immense gameplay on titles like Minecraft - Super Smash Bros - Super Mario - Bayonetta etc. 100% Brand New, made with the highest quality material.
2.High-Precision game controller for Nintendo Wii U Pro.
3.Ergonomic design. Fits naturally in your hands with precise and responsive controls so you can enjoy hours of wireless gaming.
4.Third party product, not manufactured by Nintendo.
